00037 #include "egs_transformations.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 
00040 #include <vector>
00041 using std::vector;
00042 
00043 EGS_AffineTransform *EGS_AffineTransform::getTransformation(EGS_Input *i) {
00044     if (!i) {
00045         return 0;
00046     }
00047     EGS_Input *input;
00048     bool delete_it = false;
00049     if (i->isA("transformation")) {
00050         input = i;
00051     }
00052     else {
00053         input = i->takeInputItem("transformation");
00054         if (!input) {
00055             return 0;
00056         }
00057         delete_it = true;
00058     }
00059     EGS_Vector t;
00060     vector<EGS_Float> tmp;
00061     int err = input->getInput("translation",tmp);
00062     if (!err && tmp.size() == 3) {
00063         t = EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00064     }
00065     EGS_AffineTransform *result;
00066     err = input->getInput("rotation vector",tmp);
00067     if (!err && tmp.size() == 3)
00068         result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00069             EGS_RotationMatrix(EGS_Vector(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2])),t);
00070     else {
00071         err = input->getInput("rotation",tmp);
00072         if (!err) {
00073             if (tmp.size() == 2) result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00074                     EGS_RotationMatrix(tmp[0],tmp[1]),t);
00075             else if (tmp.size() == 3) result = new EGS_AffineTransform(
00076                     EGS_RotationMatrix(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]),t);
00077             else if (tmp.size() == 4) {
00078                 EGS_Vector tmp1(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2]);
00079                 EGS_RotationMatrix R1(tmp1);
00080                 EGS_RotationMatrix R2(EGS_RotationMatrix::rotZ(tmp[3]));
00081                 EGS_RotationMatrix Rtot = R1.inverse()*R2*R1;
00082                 result = new EGS_AffineTransform(Rtot,t);
00083             }
00084             else if (tmp.size() == 9) {
00085                 EGS_RotationMatrix R(tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2],
00086                                      tmp[3],tmp[4],tmp[5],
00087                                      tmp[6],tmp[7],tmp[8]);
00088                 if (!R.isRotation())
00089                     egsWarning("getTransformation: the rotation specified by\n"
00090                                "   %g %g %g\n   %g %g %g\n   %g %g %g\n"
00091                                " is not a rotation\n",tmp[0],tmp[1],tmp[2],
00092                                tmp[3],tmp[4],tmp[5],tmp[6],tmp[7],tmp[8]);
00093                 result = new EGS_AffineTransform(R,t);
00094             }
00095             else {
00096                 result = new EGS_AffineTransform(EGS_RotationMatrix(),t);
00097             }
00098         }
00099         else {
00100             result = new EGS_AffineTransform(EGS_RotationMatrix(),t);
00101         }
00102     }
00103     if (delete_it) {
00104         delete input;
00105     }
00106     return result;
00107 }
